introduction.section1: Despite being the fourth most populous city in Japan, Nagoya is far too little known to travelers, yet it is home to many lovely places to visit.
introduction.section2: Numerous temples and parks without forgetting its splendid castle, not less beautiful than other castles in Japan. And if you want a more lively area day or night, explore the Sakae district.
introduction.section3: Find out our travelogue followed by our detailed visits.

title: Nagoya
meta-description: Nagoya, the fourth most populous city in Japan, is far too little known to travelers, yet it is home to many lovely places to visit. For each spot, we try to transcribe our visit as best as possible by telling you: Where to go? How to get there? Why? When? How long and at what period?
social-network-description: Despite being the fourth most populous city in Japan, Nagoya is far too little known to travelers, yet it is home to many lovely places to visit. Numerous temples and parks without forgetting its splendid castle, not less beautiful than other castles in Japan. And if you want a more lively area day or night, explore the Sakae district.
